title: Tired Tropes, D-Pics For Democracy! 9.16.20
itunes:title: Tired Tropes, D-Pics For Democracy! 9.16.20
description:
In episode 716, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by comedian Ester Steinberg to discuss JK Rowling's transphobic new book, an ICE whistleblower alleging hysterectomies on immigrant women in detention, Louisville settling with Breonna Taylor's family, Carole Baskin on Dancing With The Stars, Chris Evan's dick pic, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. J.K. Rowling Proves Her Commitment to Transphobia in Her New Novel
  2. J.K. Rowling's Pseudonym Has A Disturbing Anti-LGBTQ Connection
  3. JK Rowling tells story of alter ego Robert Galbraith
  4. “WE ARE ALL IN OUR PRIVATE TRAPS”: TRANSPHOBIA IN HITCHCOCK’S PSYCHO
  5. Re: Lack of Medical Care, Unsafe Work Practices, and Absence of Adequate Protection Against COVID-19 for Detained Immigrants and Employees Alike at the Irwin County Detention Center
  6. ICE whistleblower: Nurse alleges 'hysterectomies on immigrant women in US'
  7. Louisville Will Pay Millions To Mother Of Breonna Taylor
  8. Carole Baskin’s Missing Husband’s Family Airs Commercial During Her ‘Dancing With the Stars’ Debut
  9. Chris Evans Is Using His Dick (Pic) For Good
  10. Black Rabbit by Prince Fatty, Shniece Mcmenamin 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
